DOC.brief_summary: Does prolong GnRH downregulation prior ART improve clinical pregnancy rate postoperative endometriosis patient ? ( A single centre randomise controlled trial )
DOC.brief_title: Gonadotropin-releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Downregulation Versus Oral Anticonception Prior ART Postoperative Endometriosis Patients
DOC.criteria: histologically proven endometriosis complete treatment endometriosis lesion laparoscopy first three ART cycle normal uterine cavity Eligible ovarian stimulation long agonist protocol FSH > 20 IU/L presence large intramural fibroid ( > 3 cm ) < 4 oocyte obtain previous fresh ART cycle ART sperm derive testicular biopsy ART Preimplantation Genetic Diagnosis/Screening
